text_block_list.text:
One day, we came to the infirmary to
have <chrname> checked out.
Oh, yes, yeees! A custo… a student!

Injury? Illness? Or mental care? 
No matter, just leave it all to me!

Huh? Well, I'm in the infirmary. 
…I'm a little bit of a fantastic 
health teacher? Sort of?

A-haha, I can't fool you, can I? 
I think I'll just go with a normal name.
Oho! I won't hide anything about me――

The savior who (supposedly) guides many 
Uma Musume! 
The (self-proclaimed) legendary 
bamboo needle-er with miraculous skills!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Her name is Shinzami Anshinnzawa! ! 
Whoa, Anshi～n☆

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Senseeei!! A suspicious person!! There's
a suspicious person heeeere!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Wow, it really doesn't look like you're 
worried.☆

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Wellwellwellwell, for the time being.
Now that we've introduced ourselves,
let's get ugly, shall we?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hisss! What's with the… stab-er!? 
W-w-w-what are your intentions with that 
thing!?

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
A-ha-ha! Don't sweat it, alright? 
Just poking a little secret hole with 
my secret bamboo needle.

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Then, you'll beee――, super-duper fast… 
super-duper tough… 
Anyways, you'll have a ton of suuuuper 
great things happen to you!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Ah! For the record, I'm not suspicious!
I've never failed at anything even once
before!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: ……My master, that is.

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Well, well, well, this is my first 
job, I've never made a mistake in the 
broadest sense of the word!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
I've had the experience of taking a
class on tea with… no, sorry, training
under a legendary master for 10 years.

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: Waaow, Ansh～in☆
choice_data_list: (Suspicious enough to jump out at you…!)

text_block_list.text:
There was no way I was going to 
get sucked into this story. I was 
about to leave with <chrname>, but――

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: W, waitwaitwait, wait, waaaait!!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
You're Sakura Bakushin O, aren't you!? 
You're the class president who's always 
chasing speed, trying to be a role 
model for anyone and everyone!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Of course I know! I've watched her!! 
I'm a fan!!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
I'm here to cheer you on! I'm 
here to help you, with this!!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
So pleaaaaase～～～!! 
Please give me a chaaance～!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I… If it's the kindness of such a
passionate fan, I can't let it go
unnoticed…

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Pleasepleasepleaaase! 
I'll even let you pick which vital 
point you want me to prick!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: I toooootally won't fail at all～!!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: …Probably.

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Oh, no, not probably, maybe close to 
absolutely? Sort of? 
…Well, the details don't matter!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
What kind of secrets will you aim for!?
There's the ability boost, the health
boost… Charm boost, you name it!!

…This reeks of danger, but there's 
a possibility that it could be very 
effective… a possibility.
What should I do…?
choice_data_list:
Aim for the vital point that'll 
make a strong Uma Musume.
Target the vital point that wins races.
Aim for the vital point of energy and health.

Target the vital point that brings 
increased charm.
I'm worried, so just cut it out.

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Hm-hm, the "vital point that'll 
make a strong Uma Musume," is it!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Then, I'm gonna go stabby-stab, right? 
Is that alright? 
…Is that reeeeaaaaaaally alright?

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
OK, OK, leave it to me! Come 
on, bamboo needle! Find the secret 
vital point!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: Now, relax～… Waaow, Anshi～n☆

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: Stabby-stab!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Gyaaa―!
The stab was a great success!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm brimming with Bakushin Power…! 
I feel like I'm going to Baku-explode!!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: …What, success? For real!? Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
No waaay～～～!! 
How did I just do that, seriously!?!? 
I'm a genius～～～～!!
<chrname> had a newfound sense of power!

Apparently, it seems we've seized the
possibility. I felt like we made great
strides towards our dream…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: H, hah…(pant, pant)…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What's this… I don't feel like I can 
Bakushin in the slightest… Hooehhh…
<chrname> is visibly out of shape…

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: Ahhh～… Well, um… Right?

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: …Wao, farewell～☆

I shouldn't have gone along with such 
a suspicious offer… And I felt quite 
a bit of regret.

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Hm-hm, the "vital point that'll 
win races," is it!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Then, I'm gonna go stabby-stab, right? 
Is that alright? 
…Is that reeeeaaaaaaally alright?

on, bamboo needle! Find the secret 
vital point!

text_block_list.text: Now, relax～… Waaow, Anshi～n☆

text_block_list.text: Stabby-stab!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Gyaaa―!?
The stab was a great success!

text_block_list.text: Trainer…!

I'm brimming with Bakushin Power…! 
I feel like I'm going to Baku-explode!!

text_block_list.text: …What, success? For real!? Huh!?

text_block_list.text:

How did I just do that, seriously!?!? 
I'm a genius～～～～!!

I sensed a big improvement 
in <chrname>'s skills!

Apparently, it seems we've seized the
possibility. I felt like we made great
strides towards our dream…!

text_block_list.text: H, hah…(pant, pant)…

<chrname> is visibly out of shape…

text_block_list.text: …Wao, farewell～☆

a suspicious offer… And I felt quite 
a bit of regret.

I'm brimming with Bakushin Power…! 
I feel like I'm going to Baku-explode!!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: …What, success? For real!? Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
No waaay～～～!! 
How did I just do that, seriously!?!? 
I'm a genius～～～～!!

<chrname>'s whole body was so shiny
it, looked like it was about to start
glowing! A healthy burst of energy
surged within her…!

Apparently, it seems we've seized the
possibility. I felt like we made great
strides towards our dream…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: H, hah…(pant, pant)…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What's this… I don't feel like I can 
Bakushin in the slightest… Hooehhh…
<chrname> is visibly out of shape…

text_block_list.text: Ahhh～… Well, um… Right?

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: …Wao, farewell～☆

I shouldn't have gone along with such 
a suspicious offer… And I felt quite 
a bit of regret.

bring increased charm," is it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

I'm brimming with Bakushin Power…! 
I feel like I'm going to Baku-explode!!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: …What, success? For real!? Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
No waaay～～～!! 
How did I just do that, seriously!?!? 
I'm a genius～～～～!!

<chrname> exuded a charm that made 
everyone on the street want to do 
a double take!

Apparently, it seems we've seized the
possibility. I felt like we made great
strides towards our dream…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: H, hah…(pant, pant)…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What's this… I don't feel like I can 
Bakushin in the slightest… Hooehhh…
<chrname> is visibly out of shape…

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: Ahhh～… Well, um… Right?

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: …Wao, farewell～☆

I shouldn't have gone along with such 
a suspicious offer… And I felt quite 
a bit of regret.

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: Whaaat!? Oh, don't say that～…

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
――Hey, you! 
Aren't you trespassing on campus!?

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: Gyaaawaa―!? Yikes, they found me!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: …Waow, I'm out～☆

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Ah!? I, I command you to stooop!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What speed…! 
Just as I expected of a fan who's been 
watching me run!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I must continue to show you 
my exemplary Bakushin!!

I've decided to forget about today's
incident, since it seems there's no
point in thinking about who Anshinzawa
was…

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
Oh, my, did you make a mistake? Weeell,
it happens, it happens, doesn't it!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
So, tell me one more time. 
Which vital point will you aim for!?

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text:
You're making me nervous! No, but wait,
if you're taking this long—

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: —Hey, you! You're trespassing on campus!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: What the…? Oh no, they found me!

text_block_list.name: Anshinzawa Sasami
text_block_list.text: … Wow, I'm out!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Oh, no! Wait, wait, wait, wait!

… If you've been worrying 
about it for any length of time, 
it's kind of fizzled out.

She and… <chrname> looked at 
each other and twisted their heads 
to see what was going on.
